subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova won her first WTA Championships title, beating Victoria Azarenka, 7-5, 4-6, 6-3, in Istanbul.
snippet: The Wimbledon champion Petra Kvitova won her first WTA Championships title, beating Victoria Azarenka, 7-5, 4-6, 6-3, in Istanbul.
